analyzed: ▁sa nidassan attika ▁citt ānu parivatt i du ka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁an idassanaappaṭigh aṃ ▁citt ānu parivatt iṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na an idassanaappaṭigh o ▁no citt ānu parivatt ī ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
